title: Here Are the REAL Threats to American Freedom | 9/8/22
description:
Filling in for Glenn, Justin Barclay discusses the high crime rate that seems to be the new normal in Democrat-controlled cities. Why is California pushing for more electric cars when the state's electric grid can't handle it? Attorney Daniel Hartman shares what led him to file a lawsuit to fix the certification process in Michigan. Despite everything going wrong in America, Justin shares some good news and instructs listeners on what they can do to keep the momentum going. Congressional candidate John Gibbs joins to discuss the problems plaguing our country. Justin discusses the real threats to America, which are different from President Biden's. Michigan gubernatorial candidate Tudor Dixon exposes the educational and crime problems in America.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
